item.description: My Productivity System My productivity system is based on the Apple Ecosystem which can be very useful to share information and events across all your device

item.title: Don't treat your notes like blogs
item.description: Don’t treat your notes like blogs You cannot write your notes as if they were blogs. This idea opposes to [[learn in public]] and [[teaching is the best way to learn]] But at the same time I think that we should separate things that are for us and things that we can explain to other person, as [[we talk to our selves different than we talk to other people]]

item.title: dopamine detox
item.description: Fernando__ Obregon Fernandez Hola Como estas Diffitulty to focus on important task

item.title: How to get the most of a book
item.description: How to get the most of a book [!important] Main ideas Call to an action Big picture Many people (including me) [[The era of consumption|now days consume a lot of content]] thinking that it will help them at some point or that this information will be useful at some point - but the reality is that, even if it is educative content, the greatest probability is that you’ll forget most of it and that in reality you just wasted your time consuming that content.

item.title: If you only focus on connections that are already made you'll never create something new
item.description: Most of the revolutionary Ideas This quote made me think about the [[Zettelkasten/T knowledge]] References How to achieve more by doing less

item.title: In life the goal is not to learn as much as possible, is to do as much as possible
item.description: In life the goal is not to learn as much as possible, is to do as much as possible In life the goal is not to learn as much as possible, is to do as much as possible

item.title: My IPhone Configuration
item.description: My IPhone Configuration Night Shift 19:00 -> 6:00 Notifications Block via No disturb focus mode And disable most of the apps that doesn’t matter to me Notification Summary I receive a summary of my main applications at the next times:

item.title: My obsidian note-taking system
item.description: My obsidian note-taking system Philosophy Create notes based on knowledge,content, daily notes and travel Maps - Travel Drawings - History Diagrams - Books Tags Siri shortcuts Obsidian controls Search/Create notes (⌘ + p) Command Palette (⌘ +⇧ + P) GIT Slides Admonition Insert templates (⌘ +t ) Tags draft - ([[#Digital garden]] visibility) VIM-like motion Sidebar L(⌘ + ⇧ + B) - R (⌘ + ⇧ + X) Highlight (⌘ + h) Plugins Excalibrain [[Obsidian Excalidraw Plugin]] Drawing Linking Drawing Libraries Embed drawing [[Obsidian Outliner]] Configuration [[Obsidian Templater]] [[Obsidian Dataview]] [[Kindle]] Templater Admonition How do I use obsidian?

item.title: Productivity with Obsidian
item.description: Productivity with Obsidian Why obsidian? Obsidian is a great tool to use as it lets you increase your knowledge incrementally with a minimum set-up and implementing a basic [[Zettelkasten Methodology]] we can create a great note-taking system
